name: Thanatos Rises
description:
Defeat deadly hordes of enemies in this frantic game!

Dodge through enemy attacks to charge your ranged attack.

Made as the final assignment for the Game Development II course in Image Campus.

There was a really rough road making this one, but it paid out at the end

Music made by Ayrton "GfXfactor" Izquierdo.

link to repository:

https://github.com/pancreasio/Thanatos_Arrives
